AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Abdullah Yusuf: Defendant involved in a human smuggling case near Laredo, Texas, convicted of trafficking aliens, who waived his Miranda rights and was hauling a load for Steel on Steel Transportation
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Andrew S. Oldham: Circuit Judge presiding over the appeal of Abdullah Yusuf's case
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Juan Carlos De Arcos: Homeland Security Inspector who testified about the lot on Auburn Road and investigated You Brokerage
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.You Brokerage: Company whose existence was not found by Agent De Arcos during his investigation
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.USA Trucking: Carrier company listed on the BOL for the load in question
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Steel on Steel Transportation: Yusuf's company, which was not listed as the carrier on the BOL
